SS:  Let's hope not, I was under the impression Tyreal
wanted to form and alliance with these Maximals, not
blow them to bits......well not immediately anyway.

He breathed another stream of fire.

OOC:  Are the shield down yet?

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Burrock: Ya really think there's anyone here?
> 
> He fires spikes again, hoping to pierce the base's
> shield so he could 
> fire acidic spikes on the building itself.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > SS breathed a massive stream of fire on it again.
> > 
> > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Burrock would have smiled if his worm form
> allowed
> > > him to.
> > > 
> > > Burrock: I heard that! HERE I AM!
> > > 
> > > He transformed while digging up, which made the
> > > ground fly up in the 
> > > air around him. Immediately, he started
> attacking
> > > with his four 
> > > tendrils, trying to knock something off the
> base,
> > > and fired many small 
> > > spikes from his left fist.
> > > 
> > > Burrock: Let them taste my fury!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > SS reaches the Maxi base.
> > > >

> > > > 
> > > > He breaths fire on the shield.
> > > >

> > > > > 
> > > > > Burrock: Hey, Handbag-face, where are we
> > > supposed to
> > > > > meet up? Do we go 
> > > > > in and wreck or what?
> > > > >

> get
